resources.string: If for whatever reason you would like to make a donation to the Garda Benevolent Trust Fund you can send a cheque, postal order or bank draft to:
The Secretary, Garda Benevolent Trust Fund, 4th Floor, Phibsboro Tower, Phibsboro, Dublin 7.
For your convenience, we can provide our BIC & IBAN details for E.F.T Payments Online.
Please include your name and full Postal address, as a receipt is issued for all donations received.
This application requires Location permissions & Camera permissions to work.
Incident can be reported by long clicking anywhere within 1km of your radius you\'d be able to drop a Marker on Maps.
If mistakenly marked at wrong location, you can always long click on marker to correct incident location.
After your\'e completely satisfied with location you can proceed with few question about incident.
Note: All the information should be legit otherwise legal investigation will be conducted.
For making yourself safe and proud.
Are you involved in this incident?
Are you doing this for someone you know?
Please write as much information as you can:
Please confirm that all information provided is true and is best of your knowledge.
Please confirm if you want to be contacted for verification and information purposes.
To report incidents, allow Reportit access to your location. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn location On.
